author: TheLegoMaster35
title: Kinda Useless
review:
While it may surprise most everyone that I’m writing a review of pen, I’m trying to review every set I own. 

Now this is hardly anything to talk about, so I’ll do a short pro/con list for sake of everyone’s time. 

Pros:

-Parts are interchangeable with other pens and can be customized to your liking. 

Cons:

-Waste of money unless you’re collecting

-Barely compatible with system sets

Overall:

-Junk
